message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a scientific publication recommender system based on users' tweets, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval techniques. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions topic modeling, which falls under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The use of hierarchical variant of CF-IDF suggests the relevance of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and the comparison of different temporal decay functions and content richness suggests the relevance of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.SD (Software Engineering).
